name: Helicopter Hostility
description:
Blow your opponent to pixels in this tactical helicopter dogfight game!

Helicopter Hostility is a tactical, one-button action game where you duel your opponents in explosive dogfights. Play against a friend on a shared screen or face the CPU in a set of short, action-packed duels.

The current version includes the following helicopters:
AH-64 (USA), Mi-28 (Russia), Z-10 (China), UH-60 (USA), Tigre (France), Mi-24 (Russia), AH-1Z (USA), HAL-LCH (India)
